subject: General Science
question_en: What is the correct term for the process of adding electrons to a molecule?
question_hi: एक मूल्य को प्रक्रिया क्या है?
explanation_en:
The correct term for the process of adding electrons to a molecule is oxidation.
Oxidation is the gain of electrons by a molecule.
Example: The oxidation of iron to iron(III) ions involves the loss of two electrons.
explanation_hi: एक मूल्य को प्रकृति के अनुपूर्ण की प्रकृति के अनुपूर्ण की प्रकृति
question_hi: प्रकृति को प्रकृति के अनुपूर्ण की प्रकृति
explanation_hi: प्रकृति को प्रकृति अनुपूर्ण की प्रकृति
question_en: What is the term for the process of adding electrons to a molecule?
explanation_en:
The correct term for the process of adding electrons to a molecule is oxidation.
Oxidation is the loss of electrons by a molecule.
Example: The oxidation of iron to iron(III) ions involves the loss of two electrons.
